```{r}
library(caret)
library(modeldata)
library(knitr)
library(dplyr)
data(mlc_churn)
kable(summary(mlc_churn))
View(mlc_churn)
```

```{r}
set.seed(9)
df <- mlc_churn
df
```

```{r}
inTraining <- createDataPartition(
  y = df$churn,
  p = .75,
  list = FALSE
)

churn_train <- df[inTraining, ]
churn_test <- df[-inTraining, ]
```

```{r}
churn_control <- trainControl(
  method = "repeatedcv",
  number = 2,
  repeats = 5
)
```

```{r}
fit <- train(
  churn ~ .,
  data = churn_train,
  method = "rf",
  trControl = churn_control,
  ntree = 10
)
```

```{r}
fit
```
